dsutils.brightness



alias Bright = std.typecons.Tuple!(int, "max", int, "actual").Tuple;
brightness

Bright brightness(string folder);
Get all the brightness

Params:

Returns:
the raw brightness

int brightnessToPercent(Bright bri, int value);
Convert a value from /sys/class/backlight/ in a percentage of the brightness

Params:
Bright bri a Bright tuple
int value a value to convert

Returns:
a percentage
